attributes.action: Put chlorine in Rivers around the UK
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because In summer a lot of people go swimming in dirty rivers and I believe the government should look into this so people can enjoy there summer in a safe way
attributes.background: I want the government to spend some money met on putting chlorine into rivers around the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you would like to ensure that river water is clean and safe for people to swim in, but we're not sure how the addition of chlorine to a body of moving water would ensure a clean and safe swimming area.

You can find out more about safe open water swimming here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/swim-healthy-leaflet/swim-healthy

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
